name: concourse
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing a Concourse instance & its pipelines.
attribution: This Pulumi package is based on the [`concourse` Terraform Provider](https://github.com/chanzuckerberg/terraform-provider-concourse).

password.description: Password, do not use if using target

target.description: Target as in 'fly --target', do not use if using team/username/password

team.description: Team name, do not use if using target

url.description: URL, do not use if using target

username.description: Username, do not use if using target

provider.description:
The provider type for the concourse package. By default, resources use package-wide configuration
settings, however an explicit `Provider` instance may be created and passed during resource
construction to achieve fine-grained programmatic control over provider settings. See the
[documentation](https://www.pulumi.com/docs/reference/programming-model/#providers) for more information.

password.description: Password, do not use if using target

target.description: Target as in 'fly --target', do not use if using team/username/password

team.description: Team name, do not use if using target

url.description: URL, do not use if using target

username.description: Username, do not use if using target
